Articles.Content:
So with a bit of work, I have got 1.0 aero under control, (for now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)) 

The first creation to roll out of the factory doors was the K7 "Bloodlust", I think the K stands for Kerbal, I haven't decided yet.

![fnuSWTh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fnuSWTh.jpg)

Lining up on the runway

![8pKnBCp.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8pKnBCp.jpg)

Mach 1+ in level flight.

![XkGOGXi.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XkGOGXi.jpg)

Mach 1.25 in a controlled 70 Degree dive (hitting the 1.0.x aero brick wall ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

![4q6TOAw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/4q6TOAw.jpg)

Around a 13km operation ceiling (on air breathing)

[http://kerbalx.com/sam841/K7-BloodLust-STOCK](http://kerbalx.com/sam841/K7-BloodLust-STOCK) If anyone is interested.

Any ideas on how I can improve this design/design concepts? Any help is appreciated.

 - Sam
